message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13,500, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd be willing to meet you at $11,000. I think that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but $11,000 is cutting it too close to my bottom line. Let's meet in the middle - how about $12,500?  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm afraid $12,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to meet you at $11,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
